member.summary:
An action result produced by the . This object should be returned by any client-facing controller methods in your project. This result can hold any one of three forms of content:
No content with successful status code.
JSON content (application/json) with a successful status code.
JSON content (application/problem+json) with an unsuccessful status cude.
Each of these items will contain at the very least an HTTP status code and a response type header.
